title: Preview Worker: Integrate Renderer (ffmpeg / python orchestration)
body:
## Description
Integrate the rendering backend (existing python/ffmpeg tools) with the worker. Worker should call renderer, capture stdout/stderr logs, and return exit status.

## Priority
P0

## Estimated Effort
8-16 hours

## Acceptance Criteria
- Worker spawns renderer (python script or ffmpeg chain) with job inputs and produces final artifact (mp4 or artifact folder) in DATA_DIR.
- For dryRun=true: renderer writes a small artifact (e.g., preview.png or preview.json) and worker returns 202 to API and stores artifact path in job result.
- Worker sets job status to success/failure and stores logs in job output folder.

## Implementation Notes
- Use child_process.spawn with streaming logs to files. Avoid loading whole stdout into memory.

## Labels
feature, phase-g, preview-worker, backend
## Assignee
developer
